title: Most useful app ever
comment: I have used this app daily for over a year, and I must say, it's awesome. Very few apps manage to stay on my tablet for a week, much less a year. I love the ability to place a folder on my home screen and have it show only the apps I desire. The ability to further refine these results by toggling to show only my favorites within a folder is even better. There are only two issues that need fixing: First, if I open the app to set my favorites and deselect a favorite's star, scroll down, and scroll back up, the star is reselected again. The app gets unfavorited successfully (i.e. if I open the folder from the home screen and select favorites, the app's not there), and if I exit and reopen the organizer app the star will be unselected, so it's just an odd bug. Second, sometimes when I open a folder from the home screen, it will open itself on top of a random recently used app (Kindle, email, Skype - whatever I've used lately). It's not a huge deal for me, but it is an odd fluke. Still, this is an awesome and useful app, well worth downloading.

title: The perfect solution for a cluttered screen
comment: When I was running out of icon space in almost all of my phone's screen pages, this app fortunately popped up to solve my problem. Having one folder on display instead of a bunch of icons *really* saves space. Plus, the capability to have all your apps organized into categories (or "labels", as they are called) immensely helps to place them and later find them when needed. Also a nice feature is that you can have the same app classified under several labels simultaneously, which can be very convenient - for example, if you put a voice recorder app both within "tools" and "sound" you'll find it much more quickly. In two words: superb app!

E é pequena. tá bão. O ruim é que tem algumas funções como programa de gernciamento e outras como widget. Deveria ter tudo num menu só. Achei como criar, renomear pastas e pôr mais ícones, mas são poucas. Ele deixa procurar imagens PNG dentro de apps, mas o pocesso é lento. Acho que vou pegar uma biblioteca de ícones PNG e deixar no meu cartão SD. Aí sim, juvenal. 5* Sobre arrastar, estou pensando melhor, poderia ser Opcional. Como tenho 190 apps, o modo lista é mais "rápido". Achei outro benefício fantástico. Estou usando 2 launchers. E não tenho que ficar posicionando tudo em cada um. Usando o Apps organizaer, Todos os Launchers ficam organizados automaticamente! Yeah. E para organizar favoritos de internet, recomendo o "bookmark home" (cinza com estrela verde) que faz a mesma coisa, só que para sites mais usados. (eu uso isto pois gosto de escolher entre 2 navegadores).

title: Simple, effective, useful, brilliant
comment: Like many others, I'm sure, I discovered this app via Titanium Backup. Then, once I used Apps Organizer, not only did it do what I needed for use with Titanium Backup, but it proved a very useful tool by itself. Then I realized that I wanted shortcuts in App Organizer "labels"; and for once I didn't mind an app upselling me: it suggested Folder Organizer, which had the feature I wanted. Seeing that Folder Organizer could export and import its settings and definitions, I checked Apps Organizer and voilà!, I was able to reuse my Apps Organizer definitions by importing them into Folder Organizer. All around, using this developer's apps has been a great experience. I was happy to buy Folder Organizer, and I will still use Apps Organizer with Titanium Backup.
